                  int inoff,
                  byte[] output,
                  int outoff,

        Decodes multiple nibbles in given input array and writes the decoded octets on specified output array.
        Parameters:
        input - the input array
        inoff - the offset in input array
        output - the output array
        outoff - the offset in output array
        count - the number of units to process

        input - the nibbles to decode
        outputCharsetName - the charset name to encode output string
        Returns:
        the decoded string.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if outputCharset is not supported
        See Also:

            String inputCharsetName)

        Decodes given string.
        Parameters:
        input - the input string to decode
        inputCharsetName - the charset name to decode the input string.
        Returns:
        an array of decoded octets
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - inputCharsetName is not supported
        See Also:
        String.getBytes(java.lang.String)

      • decodeToString

        public String decodeToString(String input,
                    String inputCharsetName,
                    String outputCharsetName)
                      throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decodes given input string and return decoded result as as string.
        Parameters:
        input - the input sting to decode
        inputCharsetName - the charset name to decode input string.
        outputCharsetName - the charset name to encode output string.
        Returns:
        a string of decoded result
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if either inputCharsetName or outputCharsetName is not supported
        See Also:
        String.getBytes(java.lang.String), String.String(byte[], java.lang.String)

      • decodeToString

        public String decodeToString(String input,
                    Charset inputCharset,
                    String outputCharsetName)
                      throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decodes given input string and return decoded result as as string.
        Parameters:
        input - the input sting to decode
        inputCharset - the charset to decode input string.
        outputCharsetName - the charset name to encode output string.
        Returns:
        a string of decoded result
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if outputCharsetName is not supported
        See Also:
        decode(java.lang.String, java.nio.charset.Charset), String.String(byte[], java.lang.String)

      • decodeToString

        public String decodeToString(String input,
                    String inputCharsetName,
                    Charset outputCharset)
                      throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Decodes given input string and return decoded result as as string.
        Parameters:
        input - the input sting to decode
        inputCharsetName - the charset to decode input string.
        outputCharset - the charset to encode output string.
        Returns:
        a string of decoded result
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException - if inputCharsetName is not supported
        See Also:
        decode(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), String.String(byte[], java.nio.charset.Charset)

      • decodeToString

        public String decodeToString(String input,
                    Charset inputCharset,
                    Charset outputCharset)
        Decodes given string and returns result as as string.
        Parameters:
        input - the input string to decode
        inputCharset - the charset to decode input string to byte array.
        outputCharset - the charset to encode output bytes to string
        Returns:
        decoded result as a string
        See Also:
        decode(java.lang.String, java.nio.charset.Charset), String.String(byte[], java.nio.charset.Charset)
